```{r}
file_path <- c("C:/Users/ethan.walker/Box/Ethan Walker UM/R/EldersAIR/")
```

# Load, format, and save stove grades data
```{r}
## Box location: Update Box location once final data loaded
np_stove_initial <- read_xlsx(paste0(file_path, "Input/NP/np_stove_20200225.xlsx")) %>% 
  # rename variables
  mutate(home_id = as.factor(HomeID),
         home_winter_id = as.factor(HomeWinterID),
         stove_grade = as.factor(Score1),
         area = "NP") %>% 
  select(home_id, home_winter_id, area, stove_grade) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange(home_winter_id)


## Box location: Update Box location once final data loaded
nn_stove_initial <- read_xlsx(paste0(file_path, "Input/NN/nn_stove_20200225.xlsx")) %>% 
  # rename variables
  mutate(home_id = as.factor(HomeID),
         home_winter_id = as.factor(HomeWinterID),
         stove_grade = as.factor(Score1),
         area = "NN") %>% 
  select(home_id, home_winter_id, area, stove_grade) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange(home_winter_id)


# Combine locations and save
elders_stove_grades <- rbind(np_stove_initial, nn_stove_initial)

#write_rds(elders_stove_grades, paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_grades.rds"))
```


# Clean up all stove grades data
```{r}
elders_stove_grades <- read_rds(paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_grades.rds"))

elders_ids_linked <- read_rds(paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_ids_linked.rds"))

elders_stove_grades_clean <- elders_stove_grades %>% 
  left_join(elders_ids_linked, by = c("area", "home_id", "home_winter_id")) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(home_winter_id)) 

# write_rds(elders_stove_grades_clean, paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_grades_clean.rds"))

elders_stove_grades_clean <- read_rds(paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_grades_clean.rds"))
```

# Load, format, and save stove usage data
```{r}
## Box location: Update Box location once final data loaded
np_stove_initial <- read_xlsx(paste0(file_path, "Input/NP/np_woodstoveusage_20200225.xlsx")) %>% 
  # rename variables
  mutate(home_winter_id = as.factor(HomeWinterID),
         burn_level = as.factor(Burning),
         wood_type = as.factor(Wood),
         wood_type_other = as.character(WhOtherWood),
         sampling_visit = as.factor(SamplingVisit),
         area = "NP") %>% 
  select(home_winter_id, area, sampling_visit, burn_level, wood_type, wood_type_other) %>% 
  arrange(home_winter_id, sampling_visit)


## Box location: Update Box location once final data loaded
nn_stove_initial <- read_xlsx(paste0(file_path, "Input/NN/nn_woodstoveusage_20200225.xlsx")) %>% 
  # rename variables
  mutate(home_winter_id = as.factor(HomeWinterID),
         burn_level = as.factor(Burning),
         wood_type = as.factor(Wood),
         wood_type_other = as.character(WhOtherWood),
         sampling_visit = as.factor(SamplingVisit),
         area = "NN") %>% 
  select(home_winter_id, area, sampling_visit, burn_level, wood_type, wood_type_other) %>% 
  arrange(home_winter_id, sampling_visit)


# Combine locations and save
elders_stove_usage <- rbind(np_stove_initial, nn_stove_initial)

#write_rds(elders_stove_usage, paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_usage.rds"))
```


# Clean up all stove usage data
```{r}
elders_stove_usage <- read_rds(paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_stove_usage.rds"))

elders_ids_linked <- read_rds(paste0(file_path, "Output/elders_ids_linked.rds"))

elders_stove_usage_clean <- elders_stove_usage %>% 
  left_join(elders_ids_linked, by = c("area", "home_winter_id")) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(burn_level))
```
